Articles.Content: what is actually the "april" accident called on the what (not) to post on the forum
The entire forum was wiped in April due to a bug, so a lot of the old threads were lost. That's pretty much it :I

There was a loss of data; a lot of forum posts, threads, etc were lost. The forum had to be returned to a state six months prior to the event. That said, I'll move your post to a more appropriate forum forum.
